content: red heart® super saver® 1 skein each 3950 charcoal a 256 carrot b 319 cherry red c 316 soft white d 512 turqua e 3945 blue suede f 672 spring green g note a b c and d are needed for train engine any colors of your choice can be used for letters e f and g are only used in letters of photographed sample additional supplies needed fiberfill stuffing yarn needle
